replies.msg:
想問下LQ第15題
題目：Let a and b be constants. Denote the graph of y=a+log(b,x) by G. The x-intercept of G is 9 and G passes through the point (243,3). Express x in terms of y.

如果我用
slope of G=(3-0)/(243-9)=1/78
By y=mx+c,
y=x/78 +c
sub.(243,3) into y=x/78 +c,
3=243/78 +c
c=-3/26
y=x/78 -3/26
78y=x-9 咁
如果我sub.(243,3)或者(9,0)都可以計到LHS=RHS
但我個答案唔係 x=3^(y+2)
咁得唔得？

想問下LQ第15題
題目：Let a and b be constants. Denote the graph of y=a+log(b,x) by G. The x-intercept of G is 9 and G passes through the point (243,3). Express x in terms of y.

如果我用
slope of G=(3-0)/(243-9)=1/78
By y=mx+c,
y=x/78 +c
sub.(243,3) into y=x/78 +c,
3=243/78 +c
c=-3/26
y=x/78 -3/26
78y=x-9 咁
如果我sub.(243,3)或者(9,0)都可以計到LHS=RHS
但我個答案唔係 x=3^(y+2)
咁得唔得？

唔得啦y=mx+c係直線方程，題目果條係log/exp方程
你咁搵係會計到LHS=RHS，但只限於果兩點，其他點完全唔一樣

想問下LQ第15題
題目：Let a and b be constants. Denote the graph of y=a+log(b,x) by G. The x-intercept of G is 9 and G passes through the point (243,3). Express x in terms of y.

如果我用
slope of G=(3-0)/(243-9)=1/78
By y=mx+c,
y=x/78 +c
sub.(243,3) into y=x/78 +c,
3=243/78 +c
c=-3/26
y=x/78 -3/26
78y=x-9 咁
如果我sub.(243,3)或者(9,0)都可以計到LHS=RHS
但我個答案唔係 x=3^(y+2)
咁得唔得？

我ans 9 * 3^y

咪一樣
我都係咁做，因為唔識點搞個log

呢題好淺 做咩諗咁複雜
兩條equation兩個unknow
之前log嘅make x the subject

就咁睇你係理解錯題意
你搵唔搵到a,b

log(b,x)咩黎？

Log x with base b掛
